alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Talbot, southwestern Queen Anne`s and southwestern Caroline Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Breezy Point, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easton, Talbot, Trappe, St. Michaels, Oxford, Tanyard, Tilghman Island, Skipton, Copperville, Choptank, Wye Mills, Hambleton, Windyhill and Cordova. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
